column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat Diner is one of those places you pass and you think
column2: "must be good to have that many people waiting in line." You know what?  It's true.  It's really good.  It wasn't the best meal of my life
column3: but their menu is creative and yet still approachable for people who aren't super adventurous (read: me).  We (party of two) visited around 12:30 pm on a Sunday afternoon.  After being told it would be an hour AND forty-five minutes to be seated (first available
column5: we set off to discover new parts of West Loop.  Somehow
column6: only twenty minutes went by before I received a text letting me know our two spots at the counter were available.
